code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";export function getGame(state){return state.game;}export function getEntityById(state,_ref){var _getGame;var entityId=_ref.entityId;return(_getGame=getGame(state))===null||_getGame===void 0?void 0:_getGame.entities[entityId];}export function makeGetAllGameEntities(){return createSelector(getGame,function(game){return Object.values(game.entities);});}
